当面: (とうめん) - current/urgent/pressing/impending; to confront (an issue)/to face (up to something); for the meantime/at present

当駅止まり: (とうえきどまり) - (train) terminating at this station; not in service
当駅止り: (とうえきどまり) - (train) terminating at this station; not in service

彡旁: (さんづくり) - kanji "three" or "hair ornament" radical at right
形から入る: (かたちからはいる) - to start with the looks; to start (at the wrong end) by focusing on the superficial
形が崩れる: (かたがくずれる) - to get out of shape; to lose shape
形だけ: (かたちだけ) - merely for form's sake
形だけする: (かたちだけする) - to go through the motions; to do something for form's sake
形づくる: (かたちづくる) - to form; to shape; to make; to mold; to mould; to build up
形どる: (かたどる) - to model on/to make in the shape of/to represent/to pattern after/to imitate; to symbolise
形なし: (かたなし) - spoiled; spoilt; ruined; loss of face
形ばかり: (かたちばかり) - token (effort); something done for form's sake
形をとる: (かたちをとる) - to take the form (of); to assume a shape
形を取る: (かたちをとる) - to take the form (of); to assume a shape
形シク: (けいシク) - (used in dictionaries) shiku adjective
形代: (かたしろ) - paper, cloth, wood, etc. representation of a sacred object; {Shinto} paper doll used in purification rites
形作る: (かたちづくる) - to form; to shape; to make; to mold; to mould; to build up
形動: (けいどう) - (used in dictionaries)  na-adjective; quasi-adjective; adjectival noun; nominal adjective
形勝: (けいしょう) - picturesque scenery/place of scenic beauty; (形勝 only) advantageous position/strategic location
形勢不利: (けいせいふり) - (yoji) situation (turn of events) being unfavorable (disadvantageous)
形勢有利: (けいせいゆうり) - (yoji) situation (turn of events) being favorable (advantageous)
形勢逆転: (けいせいぎゃくてん) - (yoji) the situation reverses itself; the table is turned; the shoe is on the other foot
形取る: (かたどる) - to model on/to make in the shape of/to represent/to pattern after/to imitate; to symbolise
形声: (けいせい) - kanji in which one element suggests the meaning, the other the pronunciation
形声文字: (けいせいもじ) - semasio-phonetic character (combining semantic and phonetic components)
形姿: (なりすがた) - appearance; clothing; costume; dress
形容: (けいよう) - describing/comparing/expressing figuratively/modifying/qualifying (e.g. an adjective qualifying a noun); form/figure/condition/state; personal appearance/one's face and figure/looks
形容しようのない: (けいようしようのない) - indescribable; defying description
形容のない: (けいようのない) - indescribable (esp. indescribably beautiful); defying description
形容動詞: (けいようどうし) - na-adjective; quasi-adjective; adjectival noun; nominal adjective
形容句: (けいようく) - phrase used as an adjective
形容枯槁す: (けいようここうす) - (exp,vs-c) to be emaciated; to become gaunt; to waste away
形容矛盾: (けいようむじゅん) - contradictio in adjecto (contradiction between an adjective and the noun it modifies, i.e. "wooden iron", "hot ice", etc.)
形容詞句: (けいようしく) - adjective phrase; adjectival phrase
形容詞相当語句: (けいようしそうとうごく) - adjectival equivalent
形式: (keishiki) - forma (em oposição à substância), formalidade; método, sistema, estilo, formato, modo, aparência, forma (que algo assume); expressão matemática
形式ばった: (けいしきばった) - formal; official; ceremonious
形式ばる: (けいしきばる) - to be formal; to be ceremonious; to stand on ceremony
形式上: (けいしきじょう) - in form; ceremonial; for form's sake; pro forma
形式仕様書: (けいしきしようしょ) - formal specification
形式名詞: (けいしきめいし) - formal noun; dummy noun; expletive noun
形式変換: (けいしきへんかん) - format conversion
形式張った: (けいしきばった) - formal; official; ceremonious
形式張る: (けいしきばる) - to be formal; to be ceremonious; to stand on ceremony
形式段落: (けいしきだんらく) - formal paragraph (in opposition to a logical paragraph); paragraph as defined by its formal elements (e.g. line break and initial indentation)
形式的な性: (けいしきてきなせい) - formal gender
形式的法源: (けいしきてきほうげん) - formal source of law
形式知: (けいしきち) - explicit knowledge (knowledge management terminology)
形式論理学: (けいしきろんりがく) - formal logic
形式関係: (けいしきかんけい) - formal relation
形影: (けいえい) - the form and its shadow; things inseparable

形影相伴う: (けいえいあいともなう) - to be together always (esp. married couple); to be inseparable; to live in perfect harmony

形態・機能的変化: (けいたいきのうてきへんか) - morphofunctional modifications

形態素解析: (けいたいそかいせき) - morphological analysis
形態素解析器: (けいたいそかいせきき) - morphological analyzer

形成期: (けいせいき) - formative period (e.g. of nation); formative year

形振り構わず: (なりふりかまわず) - regardless of appearance
